item.title: India's eldery travel to Varanasi to die
item.description: Some Hindus spend their last days in the holy Indian city of Varanasi hoping to break the cycle of death and rebirth.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, India, Hinduism, death, Varanasi, holy city, rebirth
item.media:title: India's eldery travel to Varanasi to die

item.title: Auto Shanghai goes electric
item.description: The majority of cars sold in Shanghai are now electric and that's reflected at the city's automobile trade fair. The EV sector in China is by far the largest in the world and is transforming the entire industry.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Shanghai Auto Show, Automotive, cars, electric, EV, vehicles
item.media:title: Auto Shanghai goes electric
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,Shanghai Auto Show, Automotive, cars, electric, EV, vehicles

item.title: Republicans Release AI-Generated Ad Against Biden
item.description: The Republicans released a video showing fake apocalyptic scenes of a second Biden-Harris term generated entirely by AI. How will AI impact elections in the future?
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, United States, President Biden, VP Kamala Harris deepfake, AI, campaign, Republicans, Democrats
item.media:title: Republicans Release AI-Generated Ad Against Biden

item.title: Recycling trash to reduce air pollution
item.description: A Kyrgyz environmental activist has found a way to combat toxic fumes choking her city by turning trash into clothes.

item.description: In Morocco, more than a thousand runners are participating in a 6-day marathon through the Sahara Desert.

item.title: ChatGPT horror: Why Musk, Pichai, Altman are so scared
item.description: Generative AI systems like ChatGPT are currently the focus of a heated discussion regarding the safety of AI technology. Notable global tech CEOs are advocating for stringent regulations and are even calling for a complete cessation of development. Where does this fear for AI come from?
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, AI, artificial intelligence, Google, OpenAI, Musk, ChatGTP, generative AI, technology
item.media:title: ChatGPT horror: Why Musk, Pichai, Altman are so scared
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,AI, artificial intelligence, Google, OpenAI, Musk, ChatGTP, generative AI, technology

item.title: Think before using public USB chargers
item.description: Plugging your devices into free USB chargers at airports and malls could put your data at risk. FBI warns that bad actors could even install malwares and monitoring softwares.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Internet, USB, charger, privacy, data protection, data theft, FBI
item.media:title: Think before using public USB chargers
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,Internet, USB, charger, privacy, data protection, data theft, FBI

item.title: Indias fact checking unit: Censorship for social media?
item.description: India announced a state run “fact checking unit”. Social Media posts flagged as “fake, false or misleading” need to be taken down. Human rights groups criticized the move as attempted censorship of opposition.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, India, fact checking, social media, censorship, human rights, freedom of speech, internet
item.media:title: Indias fact checking unit: Censorship for social media?
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,India, fact checking, social media, censorship, human rights, freedom of speech, internet

item.description: “Ingenuity” is a small helicopter operating on Mars. It has made more than 50 flights already

item.title: Transgender women at risk of violence in Pakistan
item.description: Taniya is a trans woman living in Islamabad. She struggles to earn a living following a violent assault at work.
